title: Couscous and roasted veg salad
ingredients: ['2 carrots, cubed', '1/4 courgette, cubed', '1 red chilli, quartered', '4 tablespoons oil', '2 teaspoons dried coriander', '1 bunch baby asparagus', '8 cocktail tomatoes', '250ml chicken stock', '175g couscous', 'For the dressing', '2 tablespoons lemon balm, chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', '1 teaspoon mint jelly', '1 teaspoon prepared mustard', '4 teaspoons orange juice', '2 dashes lemon juice', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', 'To assemble', '1/3 cucumber, chopped', '1 small handful dried cranberries']
